entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using RazorSourceGenerator in VS 2019 results in watson errors #39693
  • Analyzer: Warn that IResult should not be returned from Controller Actions #39692
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Razor: <partial>as direct child of @if does does compile #39691
  • .NET 6.0.101 ASP.NET MVC globalization and localization is not working #39689
  • Authorization fails in Controllers after Login is successful #39688
  • Consider adding support for `TryParse` as a way to bind primitives #39682
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor WASM hosted feature request: analyzer that detects missing server dependencies #39674
  • [Component Vulnerability]please consider to upgrade node-fetch in @microsoft/signalr from @^2.x.x to @^3.1.1 #39672
    7.0-preview2
  • ClientCertificate expired causing test failures #39669
    Test failures

Closed

  • [Question] :Is MAUI.NET blazor shipped with a browser like electron? #39673
  • Hot Reload doen't work with UseResponseCompression Enabled #38832
  • Solutions with a standalone JavaScript project and an asp.net web API project seems tied to visual studio / windows #38861
  • HotReload Takes minutes to process when updating a CSHTML file. #39677
  • Request: `dotnet watch` with specific build Configuration (and Hot Reload) #38133
  • Consider a nicer API for configuring JsonOptions for minimal actions / route-to-code #39226
    7.0-preview1
  • Perf regression: mvc #39646
  • Rendering Razor component in server mode in MVC project in partial view - left with empty tag -> related to issues 20332 (unresolved) , 13771 #39214
  • Rename BuildIisNativeProjects -> UpdateIISNativeAssets #39654
    7.0-preview1
  • Regression in Blazor build performance with 7.0 SDK #37827
    7.0-preview1
  • the runtime compilation of Razor Class Library is not working correctly at dotnet 6.0 #39404
    6.0.x
  • `@typeparam TItem;` causes invalid syntax tree due to missing ";" #39616
    7.0-preview1
  • ReaderThrowsResetExceptionOnInvalidBody test failure #27400
    Test failures
  • RequestBody_SyncReadDisabledByDefault_WorksWhenEnabled test failure #27399
    Test failures
  • Correct `SynchronousReadAndWriteTests.ReadAndWriteSynchronously` test #26294
    Test failures
  • .Net 6.0.1 Blazor Wasm - Cannot move or rename MainLayout.razor #39638
  • Model validation for non-nullable array elements #38548
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Release/5.0] Skip failing test due to expired cert #39690
    area-security, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Skip failing cert tests for now #39687
    area-security, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Bump log4js from 6.3.0 to 6.4.0 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #39686
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Switch to dynamic cert gen for tests #39685
    area-security
  • [release/6.0] Use 1ES machines for official builds #39683
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [Backport] Fix browser cookie tests to only run with HTTPS #39681
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [Backport] Fix browser cookie tests to only run with HTTPS #39680
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [Backport] Fix browser cookie tests to only run with HTTPS #39679
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [Do not merge] ARM64 PR copy #39678
  • Add dark mode for developer exception page #39676
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update branding to preview2 #39668
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [main] Use 1ES machines for official builds #39684
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Skip failing cert tests for now #39670
    area-security, 7.0-preview1
  • Add ConfigureRouteHandlerJsonOptions for M.A.Htt.Json.JsonOptions #39502
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update Program.cs #36103
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • BuildIisNativeProjects -> UseIisNativeAssets #39655
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine tests #39659
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Catch exception in TryConvertTo [updated] #39649
    area-blazor, auto-merge
  • Fix browser cookie tests to only run with HTTPS #39665
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1
  • Update branding to preview1 #39661
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Unconditionally enable `DebBuild` and `RpmBuild` #39644
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • feat (FeatureCollection): Add `IFeatureCollection.GetRequiredFeature` extension method #39192
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Removing from API Description parameters when inferred (FromPath) and not in the route #39607
    area-mvc
  • Add Quality parameter to BrowserFileExtensions.RequestImageFileAsync #32772
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Support Custom Classes for ValidationMessage #38639
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Jmprieur/fix web api templates #36130
    area-mvc, community-contribution, feature-templates
  • Add format analyzer for `BindAsync` and `TryParse` custom bindings #37002
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update code docs for DynamicRouteValueTransformer #36653
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Do not assume that `this._settings.loginMode` is not `undefined`. #35245
    area-blazor
  • Declare readonly members for mutable structs #39637
    area-runtime
